name: U+2B1B
description:
Find a way through all levels using only one square.

Controls: - Only the left mouse button (click/drag to interact)

Created by: 

  • Francisco Freixo  - Game Design and Art
  • Nuno Carriço - Game Design and Programming
  • Roberto Jr. - Programming
  • Rui Martins - Sound Design
